articles.title: Don't Miss: Perseid Meteor Shower and a Rare Super Blue Moon - SciTechDaily

articles.title: 1200-foot asteroid, 4 other space rocks set for close encounter with Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as 5 asteroids could be making close approaches in the next few days, NASA revealed. Two of them are gigantic, with widths around 1200 feet and 450 feet respectively. Know details of these asteroids.

articles.title: SpaceX launches Intelsat's last C-band clearing satellite - SpaceNews
articles.description: The last satellite Intelsat needs to claim nearly $5 billion in total C-band spectrum clearing proceeds is performing well after launching Aug. 3. on a Falcon 9, its manufacturer Maxar Technologies said.

articles.description: According to the NOAA forecast, a solar storm is expected to hit the Earth between August 4 and 5, after multiple faint CMEs were spotted heading towards us. Check details.
